alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 12:12PM EDT until June 19 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until noon CDT. * At 1112 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Marianna, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Sink Creek, Dellwood, Star, Simsville, Cypress, Blue Spring, Chipola Terrace, Union City and Marianna Municipal A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
